column4: so I could go to "not installed packages" on aptitude and install them, is it that simple ?

hm, gnome will be a bit heavy for that
i'd give xubuntu-desktop a go  - "aptitude install xubuntu-desktop"
no, it's disabled, see the link ^^^^^

which package are you installing?

still around?
yes

np :)

how about the Session list?
